name: Fistlinger
description:
Game made in 72 hours during the Ludum Dare 37. Theme: One Room.

Gameplay:

Fistlinger is a western top-down brawler-shooter game where you have to punch and shoot bad guys and defeat the final boss! Prepare for a lot of enemies! Be the fistlinger!!!

Control:
  • WASD to move;
  • Arrow keys to attack;
